dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to step into my domain, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek an audience with the Shadow Emperor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! An audience with me? What makes you think you are worthy?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to offer my allegiance and service.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance? Servitude? You amuse me. What can you possibly offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My skills in combat are unmatched. I can serve as your loyal warrior.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Combat skills... intriguing. Prove your worth in battle, only then will I consider your offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess secrets of dark magic that could aid your reign.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dark magic, you say? Show me a glimpse of this power, or face my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and guidance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and guidance from me, the Shadow Emperor? What folly is this?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my services in exchange for your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Services in exchange for wisdom... perhaps you are not as foolish as you seem. Prove your dedication, and you may receive what you seek.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your intellect, let us engage in a battle of wits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle of wits, you say? Very well, let us see if you can match my cunning.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with the likes of you. Leave me be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare to dismiss me? You will regret your insolence!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat and leave this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Smart move, mortal. Leave and never return, or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel, let us settle this now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A duel? Very well, prepare yourself for a swift defeat.
